Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Epithets[ENDCOLOR] is a new gameplay mechanic based upon your people's assessment of your rule at the beginning of each new Era. During any given Era, certain actions will accumulate Epithet Progress. On entering a new Era, if you have enough Epithet Progress, your people will recognise you with an Epithet - a special title and a one-time reward based on your dominant actions during the last Era. This will continue each Era until the end of the game.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Epithet Progress can be accumulated by building Wonders, earning Great People, conquering and razing cities, clearing Barbarian Camps, starting Golden Ages and WLTKDs, and spending Faith and Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Progress is reset each Era.
Your monuments have left their mark; for the many National Wonders that you have built, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the August[ENDCOLOR],' starting a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

Your kindness has left its mark; for the many 'We Love the King Days' that you have started, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Beloved[ENDCOLOR],' granting you [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production in all your cities.
Your battles have left their mark; for the many Barbarian Camps that you have cleared, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Brave[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free Great General.
Your industry has left its mark; for the many Great Engineers that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Builder[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.
Your conquests have left their mark; for the many cities that you have captured, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Conqueror[ENDCOLOR],' granting you XP for all your Units.
Your crusades have left their mark; for the many Holy cities that you have captured, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Crusader[ENDCOLOR],' granting you XP for all your Units.

Your entrepreneurship has left its mark; for the many Great Merchants that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Diplomat[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.

Your progress has left its mark; for being the first to enter the Enlightenment Era, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Enlightened[ENDCOLOR],' starting a 'We Love the King Day' in all cities as well as a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
Your prestige has left its mark; for the many Golden Ages that you have started, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Glorious[ENDCOLOR],' starting a 'We Love the King Day' in all cities.
Your goodness has left its mark; for the many Golden Ages that you have started, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Good[ENDCOLOR],' starting a 'We Love the King Day' in all cities.

Your battles have left their mark; for the many Great Generals that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Great[ENDCOLOR],' granting you [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all currently known City-States.

Your devotion has left its mark; for the Faith that you have spent on units, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Holy[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice.
Your humanity has left its mark; for the many Great Doctors that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Humane[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.

Your great works have left their mark; for the Cultural Great People that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Illustrious[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
Your fairness has left its mark; for the many Courthouses that you have built, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Just[ENDCOLOR],' granting a free [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in all cities.

Your generosity has left its mark; for the Gold that you have spent on buildings, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Magnanimous[ENDCOLOR],' granting [ICON_FOOD] Food in all your cities.
Your monuments have left their mark; for the many World Wonders that you have built, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Magnificent[ENDCOLOR],' starting a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.

Your discoveries have left their mark; for the many Great Admirals that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Navigator[ENDCOLOR],' granting you [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with all currently known City-States.

Your diplomacy has left its mark; for the many Great Dignitaries that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Noble[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.

Your piety has left its mark; for the Faith that you have spent on buildings, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Holy[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice.

Your thought has left its mark; for the Great Philosophers that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Philosopher[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policy.
Your restoration has left its mark; for the many cities that you have liberated, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Restorer[ENDCOLOR],' granting you XP for all your Units.

Your brutality has left its mark; for the many cities that you have Razed, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Terrible[ENDCOLOR],' ending [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in all your cities.
Your faith has left its mark; for the Great Prophets that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Saint[ENDCOLOR],' converting all your Citizens to your Religion.
Your cunning has left its mark; for the many Great Spies that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Silent[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.
Your generosity has left its mark; for the Gold that you have spent on units, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Soldier[ENDCOLOR],' granting [ICON_FOOD] Food in all your cities.
Your affluence has left their mark; for having built Versailles, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Sun-King[ENDCOLOR],' starting a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.
Your victories have left their mark; for the many Capitals that you have captured, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Victorious[ENDCOLOR],' granting you XP for all your Units.
Your wisdom has left its mark; for the many Great Scientists that you have borne, you have become known as '[COLOR_JFD_EPITHET]the Wise[ENDCOLOR],' granting you a free [ICON_RESEARCH] Technology.
